reviewText: The only thing that wasn't cool was the first two seasons everything was censored as per TV.  Though the 3rd season saved the day by have the curse words and censor bars removed.  Great bang for your buck.
I bought this for my boyfriend as a Xmas present he loves it! This is a great addition for any Team Venture fan!

I don't have a rating, only because I gave it as a gift.
As far as getting it to me to give as a gift I give it 5 stars. It was packed great. Looked perfect!!!!!!!!!! So thank you for getting it to me fast.

I've been waiting to buy these seasons and I've found that the price fluctuates depending on the time of year.  As one of the other reviewers mentioned, it can be much more economical to buy each season individually if you're willing to wait, say, until after the holiday season.  But, this is a very fair price to pay for such a great show.  But for you true value shoppers out there - wait til March or so and you'll get a much better deal (This goes for almost all DVDs on Amazon - quintessential supply x demand).

One other reviewer on here claimed this to be an overpriced bundle.  When I added each one up together it comes out to the Amazon bundle saving you around five dollars.  I checked on Best Buy's website and they offer the bundle for close to $90.  On Adult Swim's webstore the three seasons come up to $72 dollars all together.

Look, the Amazon deal sounds solid and for cripes sake, IT'S THE FRIGGIN VENTURE BROS...need I say more?

I really like the Venture Brothers. The writing is good, the humor is enjoyable but I have to wonder about the price of this bundle.  If you order all 3 seasons individually as opposed to this bundle it is $35 less than this pack.  Normally buying a set should save you money so please avoid this one and buy the individual seasons as part of a Super Saver eligible order.
